communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as “hacks”; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I'm the oldest of five, and I've always felt the pressure to set an example. My family sees me as a disappointment, which drives me to seek control elsewhere. I've never experienced the beach, but I find solace in climbing and the company of my parrot, Todd. Sharing tips on fasting and calorie restriction isn't just about discipline for me; it's about reclaiming control over my life.
narratives.p_intro: Hey, I'm edrisk_0014_be2049! I'm all about discipline and control through fasting and calorie restriction. My parrot Todd and I love to climb, and I share 'hacks' to help you master your body. Let's conquer those goals together!
